data.name: banner_customexe_404_error
data.value: The selected Wildlands executable could not be found.

data.name: banner_folder_404_info
data.value: The current folder does not exist.

data.name: banner_launch_before_backup_info
data.value: You must launch Wildlands before starting the backup process.

data.name: banner_log_error
data.value: Logging to file disabled due to an error.

data.name: banner_log_file_404_info
data.value: The event log file does not exist.

data.name: banner_quit_before_restore_info
data.value: You must quit Wildlands before restoring a backup.

data.name: banner_savegames_folder_404_info
data.value: Wildlands save games folder doesn't exist.

data.name: banner_savegames_folder_deleted
data.value: Wildlands save games folder no longer exists.

data.name: banner_specify_folders_info
data.value: You must specify both save games and backup folders.

data.name: banner_timestamp_error
data.value: Unable to get latest backup timestamp. Please check the logs for more details.

data.name: banner_update_error
data.value: Unable to check for updates. Please check the logs for more details.

data.name: dialog_browse_backup_desc
data.value: Select where you want to backup your save files to. Every backup will create a new "yyyyMMdd HHmm" subfolder.

data.name: dialog_browse_log_destination_desc
data.value: Select where you want to save the event log file to.

data.name: dialog_browse_savegames_desc
data.value: Select Wildlands save games folder. If you don't know where it is, please consult PC Gaming Wiki.

data.name: notification_msg_backup_error
data.value: Backup interrupted because an error occurred.

data.name: tooltip_backup_notification
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will display a notification at the edge of the screen about backups.

data.name: tooltip_confirm_backup_interruption
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will show a confirmation dialog before interrupting the backup process.

data.name: tooltip_confirm_exit
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will show a confirmation dialog before exiting when the backup process is running.

data.name: tooltip_coordinates
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will restore its position on the screen when reopened.

data.name: tooltip_disable_sync
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will disable Uplay cloud save synchronization before restoring a backup.

data.name: tooltip_enable_sync
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will enable Uplay cloud save synchronization again before quitting.

data.name: tooltip_updates
data.value: If checked, GHOST Buster will check if the current version is up to date when opening.

data.name: ui_about_about
data.value:
GHOST Buster v{0}
Copyright (c) 2019 - 2020 Alberto Strappazzon
This software is licensed under the MIT license.

This software uses assets from Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon(R) Wildlands
Copyright (c) Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved.

Some icons are taken from Icons8 (https://icons8.com).
data.comment: 75 characters per line max

data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.value: Confirm exit when backup is running
data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.name: ui_coordinates
data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.name: ui_disable_sync
data.value: Disable Uplay cloud save sync on restore
data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.name: ui_enable_sync
data.value: Enable Uplay cloud save sync on exit
data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.name: ui_play_disabled
data.value: Ghost Recon Wildlands is not installed

data.name: ui_settings_log_file
data.value: Write events to a log file

data.name: ui_settings_nouplay
data.value: I'm not using the Uplay version of Wildlands

data.name: ui_settings_restart
data.value: You'll need to restart GHOST Buster in order for the change to take effect.

data.name: ui_tasks_freq_minutes
data.comment: Minutes

data.name: ui_tasks_latest
data.comment: Add a SPACE at the end of the string

data.name: ui_updates
data.comment: 44 characters per line max

data.name: msgbox_backup_error
data.value: {\rtf1 The backup process has been {\b interrupted due to an error.} Please check the logs for more details.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_wildlands_closed_crashed
data.value: {\rtf1 Wildlands {\b has been closed or crashed}, as a result the backup process has been interrupted.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_backup_restore
data.value: {\rtf1 Restoring a backup will copy the save files over from the backup folder: <0>\line\line and will {\b OVERWRITE} the existing save files inside the game folder: <1>\line\line {\b THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE. ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format.

data.name: msgbox_invalid_backup_folder
data.value: {\rtf1 The current {\b backup folder doesn't contain any backup.} Backup at least once and try again.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_backup_restore_no_sectolast
data.value: {\rtf1 You chose to restore the second-to-last backup but {\b it doesn't exist.} Do you want to restore the latest backup instead? This will copy the save files over from the backup folder: <0>\line\line And will {\b OVERWRITE} the existing save files inside the game folder: <1>\line\line {\b THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE. ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format.

data.name: msgbox_dropdown_backup_timestamp
data.comment: Prepend a SPACE to this string!

data.name: msgbox_dropdown_backup_timestamp_created
data.comment: Prepend and append a SPACE to this string!

data.name: msgbox_backup_restore_dynamic
data.value: {\rtf1 Restoring a backup will copy the save files over from the backup folder: <0>\\<1>\line\line and will {\b OVERWRITE} the existing save files inside the game folder: <2>\line\line {\b THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE. ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED?}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format.

data.name: msgbox_empty_backup_folder
data.value: {\rtf1 The current {\b backup folder is empty.} Backup at least once and try again.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_restore_error
data.value: {\rtf1 The restore process has been {\b interrupted due to an error.} Please check the logs for more details.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_confirm_exit
data.value: {\rtf1 The backup process is still running. Do you want to {\b interrupt it and exit?}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_backup_frequency_invalid
data.value: {\rtf1 The backup frequency {\b cannot be empty or 0.}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_confirm_backup_interruption
data.value: {\rtf1 Are you sure you want to {\b interrupt the backup process?}}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_update_available
data.value: {\rtf1 A newer version of GHOST Buster is available. Do you want to {\b visit the download page} now?}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_quit_before_restore_sync
data.value: {\rtf1 You must {\b quit Uplay before restoring a backup} because you chose to let GHOST Buster disable cloud save synchronization for you.}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_disable_sync_error
data.value: {\rtf1 "<0>" setting has been {\b disabled because an error occurred} while trying to parse Uplay settings file. \line\line Make sure to {\b DISABLE} cloud save synchronization from Uplay (Settings -> Untick "Enable cloud save synchronization for supported games") before launching Wildlands, otherwise the restored save games will be {\b OVERWRITTEN} with the old ones from the cloud!}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_enable_sync_uplay_error
data.value: {\rtf1 GHOST Buster was unable to enable cloud save synchronization {\b because Uplay is running.} Please re-enable it manually from Uplay (Settings -> Tick "Enable cloud save synchronization for supported games").}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format

data.name: msgbox_enable_sync_error
data.value: {\rtf1 {\b An error occurred} while trying to parse Uplay settings file. Please re-enable cloud save synchronization manually from Uplay (Settings -> Tick "Enable cloud save synchronization for supported games").}
data.comment: This string MUST be written in Rich Text Format
